casebody.data:
Anthonee PATTERSON
v.
Kenneth SHELTON, Individually, and President of the Board of Trustees of the General Assembly of the Church of the Lord Jesus Christ of the Apostolic Faith, Inc. Petition of: Kenneth Shelton No. 88 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 31, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 31st day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
